original_text: One Jewish day of rest, Jesus went into the house of a leader of the Pharisees. This man had asked him to come and to eat a meal with him. The people there were all watching him carefully.
korean_text: 안식일에 예수께서 한 바리새인 지도자의 집에 떡 잡수시러 들어가시니 그들이 엿보고 있더라

sentences.original_text: of a leader of the Pharisees
to come and to eat a meal with him
The people there were all watching him carefully
sentences.korean_translation: 거기에 있는 사람들은 모두 그를 주의 깊게 지켜보고 있었다
